item.title: 博廷将公布桑坦德银行数字化转型带来的成本节约，此前该行已完成多笔收购交易
item.description: 知情人士透露，桑坦德银行首席执行官安娜·博廷将于周三向投资者承诺，该行将通过数字化转型实现更精简的运营和更高的成本节约。她试图说服投资者相信，其在核心发达市场扩张的战略是最佳增长路径。【原文：Santander boss Ana Botin will promise a leaner lender with higher cost savings from the bank's digital drive as she seeks to convince investors on Wednesday that her bet on expanding in core developed markets is the best growth path, people familiar with the plans said.】

item.title: 美国股指期货在周一重挫后企稳；关税与人工智能担忧主导市场情绪
item.description: 美国股市期货周二小幅走高，在经历前一交易日全面抛售后略有回升。投资者正努力应对特朗普总统关税举措的不确定影响以及日益加剧的人工智能相关担忧。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged up on Tuesday, recovering slightly after a broad market selloff the previous session as investors grappled with the uncertain impact of President Donald Trump's tariff maneuvers and escalating AI-related concerns.】

item.title: 家得宝季度销售额超预期，得益于专业客户需求
item.description: 家得宝周二公布的第四季度销售额超出华尔街预期，这家全球最大的家居建材连锁企业受益于专业承包商的强劲需求，以及预算紧张的消费者选择低成本维修方案。【原文：Home Depot beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter sales on Tuesday, as the world's largest home improvement chain benefited from resilient demand from professional contractors and lower‑cost repairs by budget-strapped customers.】

item.title: 企业警告：别指望价格会下降，即便特朗普的紧急关税已被否决
item.description: 美国最高法院推翻白宫紧急关税后，消费者若期待价格下跌，很可能会失望。企业计划利用任何缓解措施来抵消高昂成本，并为追回退税做好准备。【原文：Consumers expecting a drop in prices after the U.S. Supreme Court struck down the White House's emergency tariffs are likely to be disappointed, as businesses plan to use any relief to offset elevated costs and gird themselves to chase refunds.】

item.title: 独家：博斯蒂克称美联储无法抵消潜在的结构性失业率上升
item.description: 美国可能正步入失业率结构性上升的时期，因企业正部署人工智能工具以节省劳动力。即将卸任的亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔·博斯蒂克在接受路透社采访时表示，这可能成为美联储面临的挑战性时刻，而降息未必能有效抵消这种趋势。【原文：The U.S. may be entering a period of structurally higher unemployment as firms deploy artificial intelligence tools to save labor, a potentially challenging moment that the Federal Reserve would not necessarily be able to offset with lower interest rates, outgoing Atlanta Fed President Raphael Bostic told Reuters in an interview.】

item.title: 特朗普的经济议程在某些承诺上兑现了，在其他承诺上则未能兑现。
item.description: 在唐纳德·特朗普第二个总统任期开始一年多后，他推行的一系列重大经济政策变革在某些方面兑现了承诺，在另一些方面则未能达到预期。美国家庭和企业面临的是喜忧参半的局面：经济强劲增长，技术投资蓬勃发展，但就业增长停滞，通胀率依然居高不下。【原文：Over a year into Donald Trump's second presidential term, his suite of sweeping economic policy changes has delivered on some promises and fallen short on others, leaving American households and businesses with a mixed bag that includes strong economic growth and a tech investment boom, but also stalled job gains and still too-high inflation.】

item.title: 投资者正享受着以数字化为核心的新兴联赛带来的投资热潮
item.description: 体育投资者正将业务多元化拓展至新兴的小规模、数字化足球联赛，目前他们正享受着这趟旅程——观众数量和全球覆盖范围都在扩大。但关于这种模式的长期可行性，仍存在诸多疑问。【原文：Sports investors diversifying into emerging new small-sided, digital-focused soccer leagues are enjoying the ride so far, with audience figures and global reach expanding - but questions remain over the format's long-term viability.】

item.title: 英伟达财报成为人工智能市场最大考验，市场担忧竞争加剧
item.description: 随着英伟达将于周三公布季度财报，人工智能投资者正寻求证据，以确认这家芯片制造商的利润能否在科技巨头6300亿美元资本支出预算的推动下同步增长。但超大规模企业计划自主设计更廉价的人工智能芯片，也正显露出对英伟达长期主导地位的潜在威胁。【原文：As Nvidia heads into quarterly earnings on Wednesday, AI investors are seeking evidence that the chipmaker's profits are growing apace on the back of a $630 billion capital spending budget from Big Tech. But signs of risk to Nvidia's long-held dominance are also emerging from hyperscalers' plans to design their own cheaper AI chips.】

item.title: 独家：知情人士称嘉能可将向行业老将魏斯菲施收购近1.15亿美元钴矿
item.description: 知情人士透露，嘉能可已同意以当前价格向行业资深人士拉米·魏斯菲施收购近2000公吨钴，价值约1.15亿美元，此项交易具有里程碑意义。【原文：Glencore has agreed to buy nearly 2,000 metric tons of cobalt worth almost $115 million at current prices from industry veteran Rami Weisfisch in a landmark deal, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 英国将对Netflix等流媒体平台实施与广播公司相同的监管
item.description: 英国周二表示，Netflix、亚马逊Prime视频、Disney+等流媒体平台将被要求遵循与英国广播公司（BBC）等传统广播机构相同的内容和无障碍规则。【原文：Britain said on Tuesday Netflix , Amazon Prime Video , Disney+ and other streamers would be required to follow the same rules on content and accessibility as traditional broadcasters like the BBC.】

item.title: 特朗普关税政策转向或惠及巴西航空工业公司、美国航空公司及航空航天产业
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司、美国航空公司以及更广泛的商用航空航天领域，有望从特朗普政府周二实施的修订版关税制度中获益。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer , U.S. airlines and the broader commercial aerospace sector are poised to benefit from the Trump administration imposing a revised tariff regime on Tuesday.】

item.title: 克里姆林宫称Telegram即时通讯应用多次违反法律
item.description: 克里姆林宫周二表示，当局已记录到Telegram通讯应用存在大量违规行为，并正采取相应措施应对该应用所谓不愿与俄罗斯合作的状况。【原文：The Kremlin said on Tuesday that the authorities had recorded a large number of violations by the Telegram messenger app and were taking appropriate steps in response to what it cast as the app's unwillingness to cooperate with Russia.】

item.title: 中东石油出口推高油轮成本至六年高位，美伊战争阴云笼罩
item.description: 行业消息人士称，随着中东原油出口激增，加上交易商在美国与伊朗可能爆发军事冲突前加速租船，石油运输成本已飙升至六年最高水平。【原文：The cost of shipping oil has surged to the highest in six years, fuelled by a wave of crude exports from the Middle East as traders accelerate charters ahead of possible military conflict between the U.S. and Iran, industry sources said.】

item.title: 对冲基金在数周抛售后悄然重返科技股领域
item.description: 摩根大通周二向客户发布的报告显示，对冲基金上周买入了最大型科技股以及那些被认为易受人工智能发展冲击的股票。【原文：Hedge funds last week bought the biggest tech stocks as well as those considered vulnerable to advances in artificial intelligence, said a note to clients from JPMorgan seen by Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称科威特石油公司吸引贝莱德、布鲁克菲尔德、EIG参与70亿美元管道项目谈判
item.description: 据三位知情人士透露，科威特国家石油公司（KPC）已就出售其原油管道70亿美元股权事宜，与大批潜在投资者展开初步磋商。此前，海湾地区同行沙特阿拉伯和阿联酋也采取了类似举措。【原文：National oil company Kuwait Petroleum Corporation (KPC) has held early stage talks with a large group of potential investors over a $7 billion stake sale in its crude oil pipelines, three sources familiar with the matter said, following similar moves by Gulf peers Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates.】

item.title: 美国新关税税率定为较低的10%
item.description: 美国海关与边境保护局表示，从周二起，美国对所有未获豁免的商品征收10%的新关税。该税率由总统唐纳德·特朗普于周五首次宣布，而非他次日承诺的15%。【原文：The United States imposed a new tariff from Tuesday of 10% on all goods not covered by exemptions, the U.S. Customs and Border Protection said, the rate first announced by President Donald Trump on Friday rather than the 15% he promised a day later.】

item.title: 巴克莱将诺和诺德旗下CagriSema的销售预测下调逾80%
item.description: 巴克莱分析师周二大幅下调了诺和诺德新一代减肥药CagriSema的峰值销售预期，从120亿美元降至仅20亿美元。此前一天，该药物临床试验结果令人失望。【原文：Barclays analysts on Tuesday slashed their peak sales forecasts for Novo Nordisk's next-generation obesity drug CagriSema to just $2 billion from $12 billion following disappointing trial results for the drug a day earlier.】

item.title: 中国敦促美国取消新关税，愿举行新一轮贸易谈判
item.description: 中国商务部周二发表声明称，中方敦促美国放弃"单边加征关税"，同时表示愿与世界最大经济体再举行一轮贸易磋商。【原文：China has urged the United States to abandon its "unilateral tariffs", indicating also that it is willing to hold another round of trade talks with the world's largest economy, the country's commerce ministry said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，福特将召回约41.3万辆SUV，因存在转向控制失效风险
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周二表示，福特汽车公司正在美国召回412,774辆探险者SUV，原因是后悬架外倾角连杆存在问题，可能发生断裂，导致转向控制失效。【原文：Ford is recalling 412,774 Explorer SUVs in the U.S., citing an issue with rear suspension toe links, which may fracture, leading to a loss of steering control, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿提哈德航空利润飙升近50%，机队规模与航线网络扩张有力支撑强劲需求
item.description: 阿提哈德航空周二宣布，去年净利润跃升近50%至6.98亿美元。运力提升支撑了各市场的强劲需求，并推高了其客座率。【原文：Etihad Airways reported a near 50% jump in net profit to $698 million last year, the carrier said on Tuesday, as increased capacity supported strong demand across markets and lifted its load factor.】

item.title: 印度科技行业预计在2026财年增长6%，规模将达3150亿美元，行业机构称
item.description: 印度科技行业预计在本财年实现6.1%的增长，营收将达到3150亿美元，并在下个财年保持在该水平。行业机构周二表示，人工智能驱动的服务以及全球产能中心业务将成为增长引擎。【原文：India's technology sector is expected to grow 6.1% to $315 billion revenue in the ongoing fiscal year and remain around that level next fiscal, driven by artificial intelligence-led services as well as business at global capacity centres, an industry body said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 韩国现代汽车警告称，尽管最高法院作出裁决，美国关税压力仍可能加剧
item.description: 现代汽车总裁金成周二敦促韩国迅速通过3500亿美元美国投资计划的立法，并警告称尽管特朗普政府在法律上遭遇挫折，但仍可能对汽车等行业加剧关税压力。 金成在与反对党议员及工商团体官员的会议上发表上述言论，会议旨在讨论该投资计划——该计划是去年达成的美韩贸易协定组成部分，若实施将使美方关税从25%降至15%。【原文：Hyundai Motor President Sung Kim on Tuesday urged South Korea to swiftly pass legislation for a $350 billion U.S. investment package, cautioning the Trump administration may escalate tariff pressure on sectors such as autos despite its legal setback. Kim made the comments at a meeting with opposition lawmakers and business association officials to discuss the investment package which forms part of a U.S. trade deal agreed last year, which would see Washington lowering tariffs from 25% to 15%.】

item.title: 动荡的一年为特朗普的国情咨文演讲奠定基调
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普将于周二在国情咨文演讲中，向美国选民推销其动荡且打破常规的第二个任期。选民将在11月决定共和党是否能继续掌控国会。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump will use his State of the Union address on Tuesday to sell his turbulent, norm-breaking second term to American voters who will decide in November whether his Republican Party retains control of Congress.】

item.title: 特朗普新关税政策将焦点转向国际收支平衡；经济学家认为不会引发危机
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普总统为替代被美国最高法院否决的关税而临时征收的15%关税，旨在解决许多经济学家认为并不存在的问题：美国的国际收支危机。这使得新关税可能面临新的法律挑战。【原文：President Donald Trump'stemporary 15% tariffs to replace those struck down by the U.S. Supreme Court are meant to resolve a problem that many economists say does not exist: a U.S. balance of payments crisis, making them potentially vulnerable to new legal challenges.】

item.title: 俄罗斯《俄罗斯报》报道，俄方正以刑事案件为由调查Telegram创始人杜罗夫
item.description: 据俄罗斯官方报纸《俄罗斯报》援引联邦安全局消息报道，俄罗斯正以"协助恐怖活动"的刑事案件为由，对Telegram创始人帕维尔·杜罗夫展开调查。【原文：Russia is investigating Telegram founder Pavel Durov as part of a criminal case on the "facilitation of terrorist activities", state-run newspaper Rossiyskaya Gazeta reported, citing the Federal Security Service (FSB).】

item.title: 晨间要闻：特朗普对全球怒不可遏，其关税政策成效不彰
item.description: 格雷戈尔·斯图尔特·亨特带您展望欧洲及全球市场今日走势【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Gregor Stuart Hunter】

item.title: 欧洲汽车销量1月下滑，汽油车销量大幅下降
item.description: 欧洲汽车制造商协会（ACEA）周二公布的数据显示，受德国、法国、比利时和波兰等主要市场销量下滑拖累，欧洲1月新车销量同比下降，这是自6月以来首次出现下滑。【原文：New car sales in Europe fell year-on-year in January for the first time since June, weighed by declines in major markets including Germany, France, Belgium and Poland, data from the European auto lobby ACEA showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 诺华的失误凸显礼来在减肥药领域不断扩大的领先优势
item.description: 在美国死对头礼来公司凭借减肥处方药和估值一路领先之际，诺和诺德最不愿做的就是助其一臂之力。然而，这家丹麦公司新一代减肥药的最新试验数据却横空出世。【原文：With U.S. arch rival Eli Lilly streaking away on weight-loss prescriptions and valuation, the last thing Novo Nordisk needed was to give it a helping hand. Then came the latest trial data for the Danish company's next-generation obesity drug.】

item.title: 研究显示，美国散户投资者推动杠杆ETF交易激增
item.description: 根据Direxion（该类ETF的提供商）与两家分析公司Vanda Research和The Compound Insights联合发布的新研究，美国市场上近90%的杠杆单只股票ETF交易可追溯至个人投资者。【原文：Nearly 90% of all the trading in leveraged single-stock ETFs in the U.S. market can be traced to transactions by individual investors, according to a new study co-authored by Direxion, a provider of those ETFs, together with two analytical firms, Vanda Research and The Compound Insights.】

item.title: 法庭文件显示，Meta高管曾警告称Facebook Messenger加密计划"极其不负责任"
item.description: 根据提交至新墨西哥州法院的一份内部文件显示，尽管公司内部警告称加密措施将阻碍这家社交媒体巨头向执法部门举报儿童剥削案件的能力，Meta高管仍推进了为其Facebook和Instagram应用相关消息服务加密的计划。【原文：Meta executives proceeded with a plan to encrypt the messaging services connected to its Facebook and Instagram apps despite internal warnings that it would hinder the social media giant’s ability to flag child-exploitation cases to law enforcement, according to internal company documents filed in a New Mexico state court case.】
